subject: Please,Write me Back !
body:
Dear Friend,   My name is Thomas Lee,from Republic of Liberia.I got your contacts through the internet,in search of a good fellow who will assist me to safeguard my family wealth from the attack of the political rebel forces in my country.   Presently,i have escaped to a near-by country in west-Africa,where i am right now and i need your assistance to help me invest the fund i inherited from my father.The amount of the fund worths:$1.5MUSD.This fund is deposited presently in a security company in London,and i want to invest it in buying of houses in your city.Please,can you help me do this?If you're willing to assist me,i will give to you a 10%,after transfering the funds to you,i will then come over to meet with you inperson and you help me to invest it properly.
Send me your name,addresses ,photo and phone numbers for quick update ofthis transaction.   I appreciate your help and assistance ! I await your urgent reply.   Cheers,Thomas Lee.

Don't get soaked.  Take a quick peak at the forecast  with theYahoo! Search weather shortcut.
